properties.media:imagetext:
The wines served aboard United's flights are chosen
in consultation with Doug Frost, columnist and author
(On Wine, 2001; Uncorking Wine, 1996). Mr. Frost has been nominated
for the prestigious James Beard Foundation Award and is one
of only three people in the world to hold both the title of Master
Sommelier and Master of Wine. Mr. Frost and United Airlines
have taken a truly global perspective in selecting wines
for your appreciation and enjoyment.
A votre santé!
FEATURED WINES
Your flight attendant will inform you of today's selections.
Some of these wines may only be available on selected flights.
CHAMPAGNE
Baron-Fuenté
Dry and full-bodied with toasty-yeasty flavors
De Venoge Brut Select Cordon Bleu NV
Aromas of flowers and toast are followed with grapefruit and peach
WHITE WINE
Dopff & Irion Alsace 2002, Pinot Blanc
Typical Alsace yellow-skinned apple flavor
Jean-Lue Colombo Côtes du Rhône Les Abeilles 2002
Complex, crisp and well-balanced, it is an incredible value
Van Loveren Robertson Riesling 2003
Peculiar flavors for a Riesling but a charming white
Kenwood Yulupa California Chardonnay 2003
A crisp Chardonnay with balanced richness and a smooth finish.
RED WINE
Robert Skalli Minervois 2003
Forceful notes of warm spices, blackberry and black currant
Château du Grand Caumont Corbières 2001, Cuvée Speciale
Instantly delicious berry-like flavors
Arciero Novella Estate Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon
Rich, smoky aromas of blackberry, plum and crescents
Paso de Luz San Rafael Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
Appetizing herb-like flavor of classic Chilean Cabernet
Jindalee Murray-Darling Victoria Shiraz 2003
Bold flavors of ripe berries rule in a user-friendly wine
BEVERAGES
Apéritifs, cocktails, spirits, liqueurs and beer
Sandeman's Porto will be offered during the main meal's dessert.
STARBUCKS. coffee will be available throughout the flight.
002W004 01/05
TO BEGIN
Duet of smoked salmon and ham appetizer
Gravlax, Kalamata olive and lemon aïoli
Fresh seasonal greens
Beetroot vinaigrette or lemon myrtle dressing
MAIN COURSE
We have boarded additional servings of vegetables for our customers
who are restricting their consumption of carbohydrates.
Let your flight attendant know if you would like today's selection
of broccoli and julienned red pepper.
Filet mignon with Bordelaise sauce and mushrooms*
Potatoes au gratin and green beans
Roasted breast of chicken with marsala cream sauce
White and wild rice pilaf with sautéed leeks and carrots
New England crab cakes with béarnaise sauce
Rice pilaf, oven-roasted tomatoes and green beans
DESSERT
International cheese selection
Heritage Brie and Kapiti Cheddar cheese
Raspberry and hazelnut cake
MIDFLIGHT SNACK
Please help yourself to assorted treats between the two main meals.
Sandwiches are available upon request.
PRIOR TO ARRIVAL
Your selected entree will be served
with breakfast breads, butter and fruit preserves
Gruyère cheese and chive omelette with tomato concassée
Grilled Kassler ham and a fresh fruit appetizer
Fresh seasonal fruit plate with creamy yogurt
* Today's menu features beef from Australia.
We apologize if occasionally your choice is not available.
SYD-LAXISFO (LD83-S89-B87
291C001-3
2006.034.146
